name: Lunch Time Rush
description:
Lunch Time Rush is a Tower Defence, Kitchen Rush game that combines aspects of both genres into an enjoyable quick to play mobile game. You play as the sole employee of a fast food restaurant that operates using state of the art food towers that shoot food directly into the customer's mouth.

If you'd like to play the game in-browser (mobile, portrait orientation required), visit the creator's game page here: https://45174547.itch.io/lunch-time-rush-group-l

Note: created over one semester at Macquarie University in Games Project A (COMP3150).
